name: Just Another Tower Defense Game
description:
It works like any other tower defense game you first buy any tower you want on the right of your screen and let me quickly explain all the towers!

Turret - it's the basic one it shoots fast but has low damage also high ranged!

Sniper - it shoots slowly but fires powerful lasers over an infinite distance!

Sprayer - it shoots many bullets all around it over a short range useful in corners!

Cannon - it slowly shoots powerful explosives that damage many enemies!

Slower - it slows down enemies in a short range!

Buffer - it buffs other towers in its radius!

after you have placed them down you can also upgrade them by clicking on them!

also you want to keep an eye out on the enemy stats that are shown on the bottom left of the screen there are all the stats you need to know, how much health they have, how fast the move, how much money they give you when killed and what towers they are immune to! yeah that's right they have a chance to be immune to random towers starting from round 5!
